General.Name: Guangdong Yizumi Precision Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Yizumi Holdings Co., Ltd. designs, researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and services various molding machines in China and internationally. It offers injection molding machines, die-casting machines, rubber injection molding machines, industrial 3D printing machines, and robotic automation systems, as well as high-speed packaging systems. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Yizumi Precision Machinery Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Yizumi Holdings Co., Ltd. in November 2022. Yizumi Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.
General.Address: No. 22, Ke Yuan 3 Road, Foshan, China, 528306
